item.title: Hydraulic Arm
item.description: A hydraulic arm I made for a school project. It turned out pretty well.

item.title: Space Invaders
item.description: A Space Invaders style game I made using python and pygame. It's pretty basic, but I learned a lot through the process.

item.title: The Compiler
item.description: My page for files and websites I find useful (and you might too!). Coming Soon.

item.title: Renders/Graphic Design
item.description: I have been working on designing some everyday items for rendering, to develop skills and to use in graphic design.

item.title: Minecraft Modifications
item.description: I have wrote small amounts of code and made game specific files to modify the popular voxel-based game, Minecraft.

item.title: Double Chomp (Robot)
item.description: A robotics CAD challenge, in which I designed a functional robot for a competition.

item.title: 2702 Rebels 2020 Robot
item.description: I was a part of designing and building the 2702 Rebels 2020 FRC robot, designed to compete in the Infinite Recharge robotics competition.

item.title: Engine Assembly
item.description: I recently built a small engine from basic components, used for appliances like lawnmowers or snowblowers.

item.title: 2702 Rebels 2019 Robot
item.description: I was a part of designing and building the 2702 Rebels 2019 FRC robot, designed to compete in the Destination Deep Space robotics competition.
